title: P.O.D. -  Satellite (Limited Edition) 2002  320ak
description:
P.O.D. -  Satellite (Limited Edition) 2002  320

Satellite is the fourth studio album and the second major label release by nu metal band P.O.D.. The album was released on September 11, 2001, debuting at No. 6 on the Billboard 200 chart with over 133,000 copies sold. It spent 5 consecutive weeks in the Top 10 of that chart.

It went on to sell over 3 million copies in the U.S., and over 7 million worldwide, making it the band's top-selling album. 

Satellite was placed at No. 137 on the Billboard's top 200 albums of the decade (2000â€“2009). It was the 117th best selling album of 2001 and the 26th best-selling album of 2002 in the United States.

The best album they made so Im putting it up. Yeah I know I posted the Standard version like a year or so ago but its worth hearing again
Enjoy and seed.  
They are still active and touring so go to the shows and buy the merch, that's the best way to support the artist
